string-array.name: Questions
string-array.item: How to i register to become a user?
Where do i changes my password?
How to a changes my email?
Why is my password not matching?
How do a sign in with my google login?

string-array.name: Answers
string-array.item: Clicking on the register button on the login and filling out the registration from.
On the settings page to changes password.
Clicking on the account settings and click change email..
Means the two passwords entered during registration no not match.
Clicking on the google signing button at the bottom of the login page.

resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
